com.avionos.aem.foundation.core.resource

Class DelegateComponentResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avionos.aem.foundation.core.resource.DelegateComponentResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Accessible, Inheritable, Linkable, ComponentResource, Traversable<ComponentResource>

    public abstract class DelegateComponentResource
extends Object
implements ComponentResource
    Extendable class that delegates to a ComponentResource instance. Use when instantiating component resource instances directly (i.e. not in the context of a JSP or HTL request).

        public final Optional<String> getAsHref(String propertyName)
        Description copied from interface: Accessible
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get an Optional containing the href to the resource (i.e. the content path with ".html" appended).
        Specified by:
        getAsHref in interface Accessible
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        Returns:
        href value wrapped in an Optional

      • getAsHref

        public final Optional<String> getAsHref(String propertyName,
                                        boolean strict)
        Description copied from interface: Accessible
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get an Optional containing the href to the resource. Use this method with a true argument when appending ".html" to the resource path is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths.
        Specified by:
        getAsHref in interface Accessible
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have ".html" appended
        Returns:
        href value wrapped in an Optional

      • getAsHref

        public final Optional<String> getAsHref(String propertyName,
                                        boolean strict,
                                        boolean mapped)
        Description copied from interface: Accessible
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get an Optional containing the href to the resource. Use this method with a true argument when appending ".html" to the resource path is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths. Setting mapped to true will map the path value, if it exists, through the Sling Resource Resolver.
        Specified by:
        getAsHref in interface Accessible
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have ".html" appended
        mapped - if true, the property value will be routed through the Resource Resolver to determine the mapped path for the value. For example, if a mapping from "/content/" to "/" exists in the Apache Sling Resource Resolver Factory OSGi configuration, getting the mapped href for the path "/content/avionos" will return "/avionos.html".
        Returns:
        href value wrapped in an Optional

      • getAsHrefInherited

      • getAsHrefInherited

        public final Optional<String> getAsHrefInherited(String propertyName,
                                                 boolean strict,
                                                 boolean mapped)
        Description copied from interface: Inheritable
        Given a property on this node containing the path of another resource, get the href to the resource, using inheritance if the value does not exist on this component. Use this method with a true argument when appending ".html" to the resource path is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths. Setting mapped to true will map the path value, if it exists, through the Sling Resource Resolver.
        Specified by:
        getAsHrefInherited in interface Inheritable
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have ".html" appended
        mapped - if true, the property value will be routed through the Resource Resolver to determine the mapped path for the value. For example, if a mapping from "/content/" to "/" exists in the Apache Sling Resource Resolver Factory OSGi configuration, getting the mapped href for the path "/content/avionos" will return "/avionos.html".
        Returns:
        Optional href

      • getAsLink

        public final Optional<Link> getAsLink(String propertyName,
                                      boolean strict)
        Description copied from interface: Accessible
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get a link to the resource. Use this method with a true argument when including an extension for the link is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths.
        Specified by:
        getAsLink in interface Accessible
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have an extension
        Returns:
        Optional link object, absent if property does not contain a valid content path

      • getAsLink

        public final Optional<Link> getAsLink(String propertyName,
                                      boolean strict,
                                      boolean mapped)
        Description copied from interface: Accessible
        Given a property on this resource containing the path of another resource, get a link to the resource. Use this method with a true argument when including an extension for the link is desired only for valid CQ pages and not external paths. Setting mapped to true will map the path value, if it exists, through the Sling Resource Resolver.
        Specified by:
        getAsLink in interface Accessible
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of property containing a valid content path
        strict - if true, strict resource resolution will be applied and only valid CQ content paths will have an extension
        mapped - if true, the property value will be routed through the Resource Resolver to determine the mapped path for the value. For example, if a mapping from "/content/" to "/" exists in the Apache Sling Resource Resolver Factory OSGi configuration, the Link path will be "/avionos" rather than "/content/avionos".
        Returns:
        Optional link object, absent if property does not contain a valid content path

                                          Class<T> type)

        Get a property value from the current node. If no value is found, traverse up the content tree respective to the page and relative node path until a value is found, returning an absent Optional if not. This returns the same value as the underlying ValueMap wrapped in an Optional instance instead of returning null.
